content:
Hi everyone! :wave:

If anyone hasn't yet made their reservations and is interested, message me. I'm looking at a few 2-3 bedroom entire apts Airbnb in Beacon Hill - Looks like it'd be a bit more economical than the hotels - $120-170/ per room.

For what it's worth, we'll have a 12 lb friendly pup :dog: with us that will be staying :smile:
FYI: Boston city council just voted to limit BnB "investor units" : http://www.wbur.org/bostonomix/2018/06/13/airbnb-boston-council-proposal-vote
Thanks @John Silva Not sure if you think this may in turn cause cancellations next week but I'll be sure to ask our host to make sure.
@Kelly Watson - I'm not sure how soon Boston will put this ruling into effect but it would probably be worth checking with your host.
Did you find an AirBnB rental? I was thinking of doing the same.
